LanguageData.PawnkindRaceDiversity_CheckboxTooltip_Qu: Allows you to directly modify the weights listed.
LanguageData.PawnkindRaceDiversity_Button_SetToZero_C: Are you sure you want to set all weights to 0?
LanguageData.PawnkindRaceDiversity_Button_ResetToDefa: Are you sure you want to reset your weight settings here?
LanguageData.PawnkindRaceDiversity_WeightSettingColum: The race def of the alien. Some races might be dynamically hardcoded and will still appear here.
The flat spawn weight of this race. It is a value that is set from 0.0 to 1.0, and influences the flat spawn chance of the race.

The flat chance that this race will spawn, calculated off of the weight divided by the sum of all the weights. Note that this does not take into account of chances related to spawning in factions or pawnkinds.

Whether this race's weights here will fall back towards the previous setting. Set to false to adjust this race's weights manually here. These settings will default depending on the context (globals to mod authors, world/local to globals, etc).
Choose what you want to do with this race's spawn conditions.
LanguageData.PawnkindRaceDiversity_DebugMode_descript: Prints out more information to the debug console. You should leave this off unless you are troubleshooting this mod.
LanguageData.PawnkindRaceDiversity_OverrideAllHumanPa: Allows the random race weight selection procedure to override the races of pawnkinds that were originally hardcoded as humans. Defaults to true.
LanguageData.PawnkindRaceDiversity_OverrideAllAlienPa: Allows the random race weight selection procedure to override the races of pawnkinds that were originally hardcoded as certain alien races. Defaults to false.
LanguageData.PawnkindRaceDiversity_OverridePawnsWithI: Allows overriding pawns that have ages that are inconsistent with what age they are supposed to be from their pawnkind (ex: children, skeletons, etc with human ages). Defaults to false.
LanguageData.PawnkindRaceDiversity_FlatWeights_Catego: These weights influence the chance of any pawn becoming a certain race.
LanguageData.PawnkindRaceDiversity_FlatWeightsPerWorl: Sets local save data of flat weights for new worlds you generate. If you want to start a world with specific aliens, modify this setting. This setting resets all values on every load to match global weights (no effects). This setting is only visible without a save loaded.
LanguageData.PawnkindRaceDiversity_FlatWeightsLocal_C: Sets local save data of weights in the current world you have loaded. Useful if you want to be very picky of what races you want to appear in a running game. This setting is only visible during a loaded save.
